thread.title: UK Interior Minister quits amid migrant scandal

title: UK Interior Minister quits amid migrant scandal
text:
UK Interior Minister quits amid migrant scandal 9:30am BST - 01:20
Britain's interior minister, Amber Rudd, resigns after Prime Minister Theresa May's government faced criticism for its treatment of long-term residents who were wrongly labelled illegal immigrants. Julian Satterthwaite reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Britain's interior minister, Amber Rudd, resigns after Prime Minister Theresa May's government faced criticism for its treatment of long-term residents who were wrongly labelled illegal immigrants. Julian Satterthwaite reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2KnlpQ4
